metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Be Mine Forever is more basic than the typical song, having below average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:

Major keys, along with minor keys, are a common choice for popular songs.
